reviews.customers_say: Customers find this dress to be a great staple piece made of 100% cotton, comfortable, and versatile enough to dress up or down. Customers disagree on the sizing, with some finding it true to size while others say it runs small, and opinions are divided on the material thickness, with some finding it thick while others say it's too thin.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars a good purchase
items.body: nice color soft fabric and COTTON ( i suspect a blend) but good price, washes well. its longer than midi on my short 5 ft height Nice basic dress, and COTTON Read more
items.author: B&C.

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars All cotton! Yay!!
items.body: I'm happy with this! It was on a good sale which is always a blessing! So, I got a couple of them to wear around the house. They're very comfortable but I think I also look 'presentable' hehe. It's so difficult to find all cotton clothing these days, so that's a real plus for me-- and that's what I specifically was looking for. I'm 5'4 133 lb and I actually ended up getting the large, after trying on the medium--which seemed a little too fitted for me. I'm not wearing it with the belt. It's easy to snip the belt off. I like the v-neck and I also like the side slits (I think they're about 10 inches). I saw some comments about the pockets. And yes I do think they are place a little high, but for me it works as I'm a bit short waisted. I do appreciate the OEKO-TEX certification that Amazon got on this. There is no chemical odor or anything from the black fabric dye. I hope this information is helpful to someone else. Read more
items.author: Makuahine

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cotton Comfort
items.body: Anyone remember creamsicles? That's what the color reminds me of, lol. Great summer dress, cool, comfortable and lightweight. Read more
items.author: Linda

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars So close, yet so far
items.body: This is a surprisingly nice T-shirt dress and fits true to size. The green was more of a drab olive than the brighter green in the photos of the model. The cotton is very thick, not see through, hangs well, and very forgiving of figure flaws. The scoop neck is a nice shape and still modest for large busted women. The midi length and short sleeves are perfect length and hang well. The reason I sent it back is because the pockets are set so high they are sticking out at the waistline adding a lot of unflattering bulk on my 5’7 1/2” frame. Secondly, the belt was set way too high. Had the pockets not been an issue, I’d have removed the belt and used without the loops at my actual waistline. But the pockets were that much of an issue. If you’re the right height/fit for the pockets and belt, this is a great dress. Note to women: it’s really off-putting to try on a dress that reeks of BO the moment the package is unsealed. Please be courteous when trying clothing on. Read more
items.author: Smaug, hoarder of books

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars comfortable and versatile!
items.body: I was expecting this to be a bit more pink but it came out a bit more orange. Which is fine! I love this shade. It fits well. It has pockets that are actually decent - I can easily slide my phone and wallet in them and they don’t budge. It’s easy to dress up or dress down. It’s great for a hot summer day, and would also be cute with a sweater and leggings when it gets cold. Read more
items.author: Nora

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality
items.body: I was first surprised by the weight of the fabric. It is t shirt material, only thicker. Not sheer at all and seems like great quality. I am 5'5 about 137 and Amazon recommended a medium but I went with a small because sometimes midi dresses are more maxi on me and I wanted to ensure a midi length. The small fits great! I do wish the pockets were down a little lower because they could slightly interfere with the belt. They put the top of the pockets right where the belt is. Very comfy and perfect for work. I am ordering several more! Read more
items.author: RDaws

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Heavy and weird bulky pockets
items.body: Pockets are quite high up on the waist, so they leave these bumpy, unflattering lumps on each side of your waist. No one wants their waist to look lumpy. The dress was true to size, but it was a really heavy material, I was surprised how much it weighed. Definitely not a summer dress due to the thickness of the material. But the bumpy, high pockets looked so weird and sloppy. Read more
items.author: Patrik Jansson

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great as pajamas
items.body: I use these as pajamas which they are ideal for. I did purchase one size larger since they are cotton and wanted to have some extra room for sleeping comfort. Read more
items.author: Sam or Alicea Perez

short_description:
Womens Dress Short Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

long_description:
Womens Dress Short Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Navy, Black, Coral Pink, Blue Tie Dye. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.
